= Request =
This request is used to get the channels associated with a spot.

= Parameters =
<br>_spot_id_: the id referencing the spot.</br>
<br>_nb_channels_: the number of channels to send back in response.</br>
<br>_start_id_: the identifier of the channel from which to start (in case some channels have already be sent to the client application.</br>

= Response =

The response is an xml file containing all the information needed for the client use such as: the spot id, the name of the channel, its creation and last update time and the number of music associated to it.
